attributes.action: Abandon plans for a super-database containing the details of all phone calls and e-mails sent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Plans for a super-database containing the details of all phone calls and e-mails sent and website visited. Not only is this an outrageous invasion of privacy recent events have shown the complete lack of ability to keep information securely. Far from being an aid in combating crime this will be achieve the opposite.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
